EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Lean+Leaders_Backers_2016.Reminder - Singapore
EmailTemplate.subject: See You Tomorrow at the Leader’s Guide Workshop!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Leader’s Guide Workshop taking place tomorrow in Singapore.
The Leader’s Guide To Adopting Lean Startup at Scale Friday, July 15th, 2016 Registration @ 9:30am Sessions Start @ 10:00am Workshop Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/lean-workshops/backers/singapore]]>
Location Pivotal Singapore <[[http://pivotal.io/locations/singapore]]> 53 Craig Road, #02-00 Singapore, 089691 Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/53+Craig+Rd,+Singapore+089691/@1.2777754,103.8379735,16z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x31da196d043e3ff1:0x4ff9864eab0dfaba!8m2!3d1.27777!4d103.8423509]]>
Questions? Contact us at leadersguide@pivotal.io <[[mailto:leadersguide@pivotal.io]]>
We look forward to seeing you there! The Pivotal Team
